content.title: Map Services to UI Elements
content.body:
1. You can see that the following mappings have already been done on the mapping editor from the left pane to the right pane.
    • records {collection} to rowData{collection}.
    • Name {string} to Label-employeeName > text {string}
    • Department {string} to Label-empDepartment > text {string}
    • Designation {string} to Label-empDesignation > text {string}
